full_summary:
================
### Battery Electric Vehicle (BEV) Procurement

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: MX-22721892206
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: Doc650837123
* **Publication Date**: April 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 23, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD), Services (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Tender Description

Canada Post Corporation invites suppliers to submit Proposals for the supply and delivery of Battery Electric Vehicles (BEVs) and related services for its commercial vehicle fleet. Suppliers are required to supply and upfit the BEVs, and provide maintenance services and parts throughout the vehicles' useful life.

#### Contact Information

* **Tender Solicitation Control Officer**: tender.control@canadapost.ca
* **Phone**: 613-734-7863

#### Document Access

Documents related to this tender are available on the following websites:
* [SAP Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15788771)
* [Merx](http://www.merx.com)

Please note that fees may apply to access these documents.
